results.overview: When Branch’s brother, Floyd, is kidnapped for his musical talents by a pair of nefarious pop-star villains, Branch and Poppy embark on a harrowing and emotional journey to reunite the other brothers and rescue Floyd from a fate even worse than pop-culture obscurity.
results.title: Trolls Band Together

results.overview: After the monstrous Bergens invade Troll Village, Princess Poppy, the happiest Troll ever born, and overly-cautious, curmudgeonly outcast Branch set off on a journey to rescue her friends. Their mission is full of adventure and mishaps, as this mismatched duo try to tolerate each other long enough to get the job done.
results.title: Trolls

results.overview: Queen Poppy and Branch make a surprising discovery — there are other Troll worlds beyond their own, and their distinct differences create big clashes between these various tribes. When a mysterious threat puts all of the Trolls across the land in danger, Poppy, Branch, and their band of friends must embark on an epic quest to create harmony among the feuding Trolls to unite them against certain doom.
results.title: Trolls World Tour

results.overview: When the eternally optimistic Poppy, queen of the Trolls, learns that the Bergens no longer have any holidays on their calendar, she enlists the help of Branch and the rest of the gang on a delightfully quirky mission to fix something that the Bergens don't think is broken.
results.title: Trolls Holiday

results.overview: Queen Poppy plans the first annual Trolls Kingdom Secret Holiday Gift Swap, but things don't go quite as expected.
results.title: Trolls Holiday in Harmony

results.overview: In less than ten years, social media has revolutionized the public sphere. While these plateforms have democratized free speech, they also bred an array of putrid ideas and world views we once thought had disappeared. Calls for deportation, shameless misogyny, death threats.... Are there limits to free speech on the Web?
results.title: Trolling The Trolls

results.overview: A group of students investigates a series of mysterious bear killings, but learns that there are much more dangerous things going on. They start to follow a mysterious hunter, learning that he is actually a troll hunter.
results.title: Troll Hunter

results.overview: An online feud evolves into something more real when two keyboard warriors take their battle offline in a mixed martial arts matchup.
results.title: INGtoogi: The Battle of Internet Trolls

results.overview: Junior, a teenage gnome, wants nothing more than to invent gizmos and gadgets in his tree-house laboratory. But Junior's old school father, Jalle, the head gnome of the forest, would prefer his son follow in his footsteps and one day be in charge of his own forest. In spite of their differences, on the eve of the first winter storm Junior helps Jalle distribute food rations. Then disaster strikes.
results.title: Gnomes and Trolls: The Secret Chamber

results.overview: Peter the troll runs in to trouble with the pirates
results.title: The Trolls and the Pirates

results.overview: Trolls in various forms have accompanied mankind from the beginning, depending on how people understood the word each time. They can be people outside society who also symbolise the fears haunting those within it.
results.title: The Times of the Trolls

results.overview: Peter troll and grandma troll have travel to Italy, to get, the stolen, money back from the mafia
results.title: The Trolls and the mafia

results.overview: All aboard.  Let’s get this holiday show on the road.  Just as Queen Poppy and Cloud Guy take the Snack Pack on their latest musical tour, Branch finds out he might just have to share the spotlight with some unexpected talent…
results.title: Trolls: Trolla-Palooza Tour

results.overview: The short follows the story of the Last Dragon in the World from the 1962 book Tales from Moominvalley.
results.title: From the Life of the Little Trolls

results.overview: Paul feels life should be an adventure, and sets out on one to prove that Trolls really exist.
results.title: The Boy Who Loved Trolls

results.overview: plot under wraps
results.title: Trolls

results.overview: Satin and Chenille are officially over 24/7 togetherness. But once the most fashion-forward members of the Snack Pack see there’s some mischief only twins can cause, they might have a change of holiday heart.
results.title: Trolls: Together

results.overview: Counter-injury is always more ruthless than injury !!
results.title: Troll

results.overview: The film follows three young characters of different social status, possessed by love for the wrong person. During the day and night, after a series of tragicomic, sometimes absurd situations they are going through, their paths intersect. The fanatical pursuit of the object of his obsession, all three end up in a suspicious night club in one last attempt to fulfill their dreams. Download the movie of the need to fulfill, regardless of the consequences. This film is dedicated to all the people in love and those who have not understood why. Film defend their dignity, to the end, despite everything.
results.title: Trolling

results.original_title: TMZ Presents: Child Star Syndrome - Triumphs, Tragedies & Trolls
results.overview: Entertainment giants created a new generation of child stars in the social media era, creating some of Hollywood’s biggest names – and some of its most tragic tales.
results.title: TMZ Presents: Child Star Syndrome - Triumphs, Tragedies & Trolls
